access: Knights of Lastwall have access to this feat.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ghost Wrangler](/Feats.aspx?ID=3628) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 83</row>

**Prerequisites**
[spirit instinct](/Instincts.aspx?ID=5)

**Access**
Knights of Lastwall have access to this feat.

</column>

---

Spirits around you coalesce upon your fists, enabling you to seize and harm other ghosts and spirits. Until the beginning of your next turn, your fists gain the effects of the [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) property rune, and you can make Strength-based skill checks against [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creatures.
name: Ghost Wrangler
